* The skill ID for the refined effect listed first is <code>SID_赤の呪いR4</code>. [[fireemblemwiki:Anathema|Anathema]] (赤の呪い) is a skill that appears in {{FE|13}}.
* Tharja's Hex originally debuted as a weapon exclusive to Tharja in the spinoff title {{FE|W}}.
